T02D2194:77a-0: @77a // aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na ma gho mi sha h'um /
T02D2194:77a-1: che ge mo shi ram k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
T02D2194:77a-2: shi ram stvam bha ya h'um phat /
T02D2194:77a-3: ka ti mu la ye ta h'um phat /
T02D2194:77a-4: ka ti mu kha stvam bha ya h'um phat /
T02D2194:77a-5: hr'i ta stam bha ya h'um phat /
T02D2194:77a-6: pa ta k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
T02D2194:77a-7: mchog phur gyis gnas lngar gdab bo //
T02D2194:77a-8: stong gsum snod kyi sems can rnams //
T02D2194:77a-9: khro bo gtum pa'i sku ru bsgom //
T02D2194:77a-10: 'gro drug bcud kyi 'jig rten dag / bcom ldan gtum por bsam par bya //
T02D2194:77a-12: rlung rdo rje rgya gram nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i
T02D2194:77a-13: bar du stong gi phyi mtha' dag rdo rje gtum
T02D2194:77a-14: po rdul snyed kyi sku'i rang bzhin du bsams te
T02D2194:77a-15: / de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs
T02D2194:77a-16: g-yo zhing brdabs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po
T02D2194:77a-17: 'jig rten khams kyi tshad tsam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2194:77a-18: / 'dar ba dang / sku'i ba spu'i bu ga
T02D2194:77a-19: nas nyi ma stong gi 'od gzi brjid can gyi
T02D2194:77a-21: ljags kyi rdo rje las bzlas pa'i sngags kyi 'od
T02D2194:77a-22: zer rim pa gsum 'phros stong gsum gyi stong rdo
T02D2194:77a-23: rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis 'gengs pa dang /
T02D2194:77a-24: klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gdug pa du
T02D2194:77a-25: ba'i 'od kyis klu phra mo dang sa bdag rnams
T02D2194:77a-26: bsregs pa dang / thugs kyi rdo rje las khro bo du ma 'phros pas /
T02D2194:77a-27: bskal pa chen po'i rlung bzhin du bgegs kun du 'thor ba dang /
T02D2194:77a-28: phyag gis rdo rje gsor bas gong du gnod par sems pa de'i sa phyogs su /
T02D2194:77a-29: rdo rje chen po 'od zer sgyogs 'phen pa bzhin du yang dang yang bsnun par bsam /
T02D2194:77a-30: de nas bzlas pa ma zin par du h'um 'brug gi sgra lta bu rgyun du gdon /
T02D2194:77a-31: bsnun pa'i 'khor lo zangs lcags kyi phye ma dang /
T02D2194:77a-32: yungs kar ske tshe dug chus brab bo //
T02D2194:77a-34: snying ga'i h'um las 'phros pas sangs rgyas thams cad phyag na rdo rjer gyur te /
T02D2194:77a-35: 'jim pa mi dmigs pa las phyag na rdo rjer gyur /
T02D2194:77a-36: sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
T02D2194:77a-37: shog bu la gnod pa'i gdon lam stvam bha nan
T02D2194:77b-0: @77b sh'antim stam bha nam ku ru nam h'um phat
T02D2194:77b-1: s'atstsha de mchod rten nag po 'od 'bar ba mthong
T02D2194:77b-2: ba tsam gyis skrag par byed pa /
T02D2194:77b-3: bum pa'i nang du phyag na rdo rje 'khor dang
T02D2194:77b-4: bcas pa thams cad mtshon cha thogs ba bzhugs par
T02D2194:77b-5: bsam mo // de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis
T02D2194:77b-6: gzhan gyi srung ma'i rigs rnams bkug nas mthu med
T02D2194:77b-7: bsam mo // par bsam zhing / gtum po'i zhabs 'og nas mi 'chor bar bsam /
T02D2194:77b-8: de nas mchod pa dang bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2194:77b-10: drang srong dmod pa yang bzlog par 'gyur ro //
